title: (x) citibank logo - Interstate {Patricia}
content:
also, I am trying to match the CITIBANK LOGO typeface, so if anyone knows what it is, that would be great! I am not looking for the OCR typeface they use for their ads, but the one that comprises their citibank logo with the red arch.   
Thanks again everyone for your help!
author: fellrath

comments.content:
[Interstate](http://web.archive.org/web/20100721130055/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/interstate/?PREFS_SET%5BRenderSize%5D=48&PREFS_SET%5BRenderString%5D=citibank)   
   
I think it's a combo of Regular (citi) and light (bank)
